entry.title: Concern about "Inscriptions"
entry.summary: In a recent discussion on the topic of block sizes, it is important to have a basic understanding before participating. One common misconception is that storage is the main issue with block sizes. However, this is not the case. To gain more insight into this topic, a helpful resource is a talk given a few years ago, which can be accessed at the following link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CqNEQS80-h4&t=7s.The discussion surrounding block sizes has prompted GamedevAlice to share their thoughts on the Bitcoin development mailing list. It is crucial to approach these discussions with a solid understanding of the subject matter.
